entries.title: Nuclear Fusion ‘Breakthrough’ Touted by White House, Drawing Praise and Some Skepticism

entries.title: Musk Says Twitter Basic Blue to Slash Ads by Half
entries.description: Elon Musk's Twitter profile on a smartphone placed on printed Twitter logos on April 28, 2022. (Dado Ruvic/Illustration/Reuters)

entries.title: UK Security Minister Tom Tugendhat Warns of CCP’s Influence on Youth Through TikTok
entries.description: Conservative MP Tom Tugendhat speaking to the media at an event in Biggin Hill Airport in London on July 30, 2022. (Henry Nicholls/PA Media)

entries.title: Dorsey and Musk Spar Over Claim Twitter Ignored Child Exploitation for Years
entries.description: A 3D printed Twitter logo is seen in front of a displayed photo of Elon Musk in this illustration taken on Oct. 27, 2022. (Dado Ruvic/Illustration/Reuters)

entries.title: Utah, Alabama Ban TikTok From Government Devices, Joining Growing Number of US States
entries.description: The TikTok logo is displayed outside a TikTok office in Culver City, Calif., on Aug. 27, 2020. (Mario Tama/Getty Images)

entries.title: Google Rejects Hong Kong’s Request to Remove Protest Anthem From Top Search Results: HK Official
entries.description: The logo for Google LLC is seen at the Google Store Chelsea in Manhattan, New York City, Nov.17, 2021. (Andrew Kelly/Reuters)

entries.title: US Finalizes $2.5 Billion Loan to GM, LG Battery Joint Venture
